inclusion.criterion: catheter associated bacteriuria with proteus, enterobacteriaceae or pseudomonas
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing and able to give informed consent to the study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with a clinically relevant UTI ( fever, pain or cloudy urine)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients not able or willing to give informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with allergies for ISobetadine dermicum or other substances used in the protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients who only have a catheter for less than 1 month
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients taking systemic antibiotics during the last 48h
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has indwelling catheter and history of recurrent UTIs, but no current clinically relevant UTI. Willingness to give informed consent is unknown.
